trips.title: Valentine's in Paris
trips.description: Experience the romance of Paris this Valentine's Day.

itinerary.title: Departure from Munich
itinerary.details: Meet at Munich Hauptbahnhof at 18:30. Board our luxury coach and start your journey to Paris!

itinerary.title: Explore Paris
itinerary.details: Morning arrival. Visit Eiffel Tower, Champs-Elysées, and Louvre Museum. Free time in the evening.

itinerary.title: Return to Munich
itinerary.details: Depart from Paris at 21:00, arriving back in Munich the next morning.

trips.title: Lapland Adventure
trips.description: Witness the Northern Lights on this unforgettable journey.

itinerary.title: Departure from Berlin
itinerary.details: Meet at Berlin Hbf at 17:00. Board overnight bus to Lapland.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Northern Lights Tour
itinerary.details: Explore Lapland's frozen beauty, then enjoy a guided Northern Lights tour.

itinerary.title: Return to Berlin
itinerary.details: Depart from Lapland at 19:00, arriving back in Berlin next day.
